original_text: “‘No,’ he answered, ‘because while you are pulling the weeds, you may uproot the wheat with them.
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 가만 두라 가라지를 뽑다가 곡식까지 뽑을까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: because while you are pulling the weeds
you may uproot the wheat with them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것들과 함께 밀을 뽑아낼 수 있습니다
